Package SnakesnLadders

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardPanel
    The BoardPanel class implements the game board which is a JPanel running inside the main GUI JForm.
    Interface
    The Interface class implements the main user interface of the program.
    Player
    Implements methods for initializing players and utility methods like connecting to the server, sending and receiving message to and from the server, getter and setters.
    Server
    Implements all the server related methods viz.
